title: Hong Kong high ping for 6 months already
body: I am playing from Hong Kong and still have high ping since FEBRUARY. Current ping is around 220, previously 110. Have been asking for support but no fix yet. Have been contacting local ISP and they said it was Australia's network problem. Does someone experience similar issues? Thank you. Please fix this ASAP the season is already half way gone!!! Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

As one of the NOC Technicians (Bark Wahlberg) posted in your other thread, there is nothing that can be done on Riots end of things to further improve your latency, your only option is to contact your ISP and see if they can do anything further (Which it sounds like they can't from your post).

> [{quoted}](name=Bark Wahlberg,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=EXNgJsP6,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-06T03:33:01.409+0000)
>
> Thanks for the MTR.  I passed this along to our engineers and unfortunately we can't influence the routing any further to improve the latency. Your only option at this point, aside from playing on a server physically closer to you, is to log the issue with your ISP.
